definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically associated with individuals or families in England; often used as a proper noun to refer to specific people, such as the British film director Ridley Scott.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英格兰的姓氏，历史上与英格兰的个人或家族相关；通常作为专有名词使用，指代特定人物，如英国电影导演雷德利·斯科特。
definitions.example_en: Ridley Scott directed the iconic science fiction films Blade Runner and Alien.
definitions.example_cn: 雷德利·斯科特执导了经典科幻电影《银翼杀手》和《异形》。
